name: Date With A Devil
description:
Date With The Devil is a light 1-4 player party game where four contestants compete to see which one of them will be chosen as a sacrifice to the great demon Goatstradamus, in Sacrifices Must Be Made, a variety game show featuring Q&A sections interspersed with minigames!

Date With The Devil was made in 72 hours, for Ludum Dare 43.

Controlled via controller, or with the following keyboard controls:

Player 1: Arrow keys to move, Z to select, X to cancel.    Enter to start.

Player 2: WASD to move, C to select, V to cancel.

Player 3: Numpad 5,1,2,3 to move, B to select, N to cancel

Player 4:  IJKL to move, M to select, "," to cancel.

We do not recommend playing with a keyboard for more than 1-2 players, unless each player is given a separate keyboard.
